name: KINGSDAY
description:
We create conversation value. To make people talk to each other. About you.
Kingsday camps out on the crossroads of advertising, PR and digital. After 15 years in global advertising agencies, we looked back and worked out what made us win every international award you can imagine: Conversation Value. Now that's what we do. To make people talk about your brand, we've built a methodology with tools like the Litmus Tweet and The Wheel of Why. We believe in this kind of methodological creativity.
